Hygiene tips for preserve your luffa sponge
This natural sponge is often in contact with water. As the fibers are very fine, bacteria and mold can quickly multiply there. By following these tips, you will keep your loofah sponge clean
how to clean it well
- Rinse the sponge thoroughly after each use under clean water.
- Hang it so that is well ventilated and can dry well.
- You can put the natural sponge in the microwave for 30 seconds after rinsing it. Any germs present will thus be eliminated
- The loofah can also be washed in the dishwasher at 30 degrees. But do not use detergent.
- Let the loofah air dry
Use only your own loofah sponge and do not share it with family or friends.
change your sponge regularly, every two to three weeks.
